title: font to go with Geometric Slab
content:
Does anyone know a nice sans serif to go with Geometric slabserif 712?  
Iâ€™m using Geometric for the bodytext of my book and I want my headers to be sans serif.  
Preferably a font thats also great for bodytext so I can switch. I was using Akzidenz but I dont like the way that font looks as body text at all. I like DIN but its soooo overused! Any suggestions? Thanks!
author: Casey
